column1: Local Foods////The only reason this place isn't a full fledged 5 stars is because of the prices
column2: the prices for the sandwiches have been slowly creeping up. Now all sandwiches are well above the $10 mark
column3: and the ones with the premium ingredients (i.e. duck
column4: seafood) are only getting higher. Although I am all about paying for quality
column5: sometimes I can't block out my mother's voice saying "What?!? $15 for a sandwich
column6: do you know how many poor kids you could feed with that?!".
